description: Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started and was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).
name: Procedure Not Performed Reason (SNOMED-CT)
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - CQI WG

text.div:
Procedure Not Performed Reason (SNOMED-CT)

Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started and was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183932001
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416406003
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416237000
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 428119001
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416064006
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416432009
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183944003
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394908001
